author: Home Repair Tutor
description:

author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower curb waterproofing tips…KERDI-FIX keeps the corner tight against the curb and wall while the mortar cures. This makes my waterproofing flat and tile work easier. If you’re building a shower and want beautiful results join our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com ❤️
